About.title: About YifanTech
About.brief: Your trusted partner in professional language services
description_list: Headquartered in Beijing, Beijing Yifan Science and Information Consulting Co,.Ltd is a professional provider of translation, interpretation, language consulting and international communication services, which include proofreading, editing, localization and equipment leasing.

We boast a broad network of translators, interpreters, proofreaders, and language experts, totaling about 120, who have graduated from prestigious universities in China and beyond. Our services cover about 30 languages, enabling us to meet wide-ranging language demands of our Chinese and overseas clients.
By virtue of our excellent service quality, we are honored to provide services to listed companies and big names across over 20 sectors.
